Title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
Writer: Emirhan Aydin, Yigit Güralp, Berkant Uluer (story), Ceren Özcan
Actors: Çetin Tekindor, Ismail Hacioglu, Kyung-jin Lee, Kim Seol
Plot: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...
Production: Dijital Sanatlar Production, Digital Yapim Evi
